message.msgid: Please check hardware connection of the WAN port.
message.msgstr: 检测到WAN口网线未连接，请检查并连接好您的WAN口网线。

message.msgid: No response from your Internet Service Provider(ISP), please consult your ISP.
message.msgstr: 网络运营商远端无响应，请确认不接路由器时是否可以正常上网，如不能，请联系当地网络运营商解决。

message.msgid: Authentication failed! Please check PPPoE Username and PPPoE Password.
message.msgstr: 认证失败！请检查您的宽带用户名称和密码是否正确。

message.msgid: IP conflict!The LAN IP address will be changed into %s automatically and it will be the new login IP address.
message.msgstr: 检测到IP地址冲突！LAN口IP将自动修改为%s，请以%s重新登录界面。

message.msgid: The WAN gateway and the IP must be in the same network segment!
message.msgstr: WAN口IP必须和网关在同一网段

message.msgid: Please enter the valid User name and Password provided by your ISP.
message.msgstr: 请输入您的网络供应商提供的宽带用户名称和密码。
请输入有效的时间信息

message.msgid: Start time must be earlier than end time!
message.msgstr: 起始时间必须早于结束时间

message.msgid: Please enter a valid server address!
message.msgstr: 请输入有效的服务器地址

message.msgid: Please enter an MTU value between 256 and 1500!
The default value is 1500. Do not modify it unless required by your ISP.
message.msgstr: 如非必要，请勿改动，默认值1500

message.msgid: The default value is 1492. Do not modify it unless required by your ISP.
message.msgstr: 如非必要，请勿改动，默认值1492

message.msgid: Select the corresponding connection mode according to your situation.
message.msgstr: 请根据需要选择连接模式

message.msgid: Connect automatically: Connect automatically to the Internet after rebooting the system or connection failure.
message.msgstr: 自动连接：在开机或断线后自动进行连接。

message.msgid: Connect on demand: Re-establish your connection to the Internet when there’s data transmitting.
message.msgstr: 按需连接，在有访问数据时自动进行连接
注意：只有当您到“系统工具”菜单的“网络时间”项设置了当前时间后，“定时连接”功能才能生效。

message.msgid: Only enter this information if instructed by ISP.
Connect Manually: Require the user to manually connect to the Internet before each session.
message.msgstr: 手动连接：由用户手动进行连接。

message.msgid: Connect During Specified Time Period: Connect automatically to Internet during a specified time length.
message.msgstr: 定时连接：在指定的时段自动进行连接。

message.msgid: MTU value! It must be numeric
Please specify a valid MAC address!
message.msgstr: 请输入一个有效的MAC地址！

message.msgid: The MAC address of %s is invalid! Please specify a valid MAC address!
message.msgstr: %s为无效的MAC地址！请输入一个有效的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Router's IP Address has been changed! Please update related settings!
message.msgstr: 路由器登录IP地址网段已发生改变！请重新配置相关参数！

message.msgid: You have changed the IP address of this router, please click on "OK" to confirm this change. The router will reboot. After reboot, if the webpage doesn't update automatically, please renew your computer's connection to the router and then use the new IP address to login.
message.msgstr: 确定更改登录IP地址吗？ 路由器将自动重启，如果重启后，页面没有自动刷新，请更新您电脑的网络设置，然后用新的IP登录。

message.msgid: This page is used to set the basic network parameters for LAN.
message.msgstr: 本页设置LAN口的基本网络参数。

message.msgid: Note: To activate new settings, you must reboot the device.
message.msgstr: 注意：设置完成后，需要重启路由器，使设置生效。

message.msgid: Please enter an IP pool start address that is smaller than the IP pool end address.
message.msgstr: IP池开始地址不能大于结束地址！
腾达 11N 无线路由器登录页面

message.msgid: Up to 16 Address Reservations are supported!
Please don't add the LAN IP address or the IP address that already exists in the address Reservation table!
message.msgstr: 请不要添加LAN口IP地址，或者列表中已有的IP地址。

message.msgid: Please don't add MAC address that already exists in the address Reservation table!
message.msgstr: 请不要添加列表中已有的MAC地址。
